testcase.classname: Perform functional testing around the actual contents of the reports that the service generates.
testcase.name: Submitting get request for dr_d1 json formatted end point and validating expected output data is matching with actual data for a scenario:dr_d1_sc_json.json

failure.message: Report_Header.Customer_ID Expected: C000036298 got: S000000004 ; Report_Header.Institution_Name Expected: University of Connecticut got: COUPERIN Consortium ; Report_Items[Database=Scopus].Performance[0] Could not find match for element {"Instance":[{"Metric_Type":"Searches_Regular","Count":8457}],"Period":{"Begin_Date":"2016-01-01","End_Date":"2016-01-31"}}

testcase.failure:
Given I select the environment on which the execution is to be processed....passed And I submit a get request with the required request parameters such as s000000004,counter,2016-01-01,2016-12-31,sc and json.passed And I provide the service url dr_d1 and wait until response is 200..........passed Then I compare the actual output sent by service with expected output file present in expected-content directory "src/test/expected-content/dr_d1_sc_json.json"..failed
